resources.string: jan %s o, o toki e ni: lipu jan sin ni li lipu sina

string.name: emailConfirm_click
string.comment:
emailConfirm_click
Part of the confirmation email upon registering for a Lichess account.
The unique reset link is presented just after this string.

resources.string: sina wile jo e nimi sina pi lipu Lichess la o luka e nimi ni:
sina pali ala e lipu jan lon lipu Lichess la sina ken weka sona e lipu toki ni.
jan %s o, o sin e nimi awen sina pi lipu Lichess.org
mi mute li kute e ni: sina wile sin e nimi awen pi lipu sina.
sina toki e ni la o luka e nimi nasin lon anpa. sina toki ala e ni la o weka sona e lipu ni.
jan %s o, toki e nimi sina sin pi lipu toki
sina toki e ni: sina wile ante e nimi sina pi lipu toki.
mi mute wile sona e ni: nimi ni pi lipu toki li nimi sina. tan ni la o luka e nimi nasin:
jan %s o, kama pona tawa lipu Lichess.org

https://lichess.org la lipu sina li lon.
lipu sina li lon lipu ni: %1$s. sina ken ante e ona lon lipu ni: %2$s.
o musi! ijo musi sina o tawa lawa mije pi jan ante!
jan %s o, o lon e lipu sina lon lipu Lichess.org
(sina ken ala luka la o pana e nimi nasin tawa ilo sina!)
sitelen ni li tawa ni: kepeken sina pi lipu %s.
sina wile toki tawa mi mute la, o kepeken %s.
